name: Real Gangster Vegas Crime City
description:
Grab your ticket to become the real gangster in the crime simulator game setting in Vegas crime city scene, and enjoy gangster car driving, make deals with the mafia lords, work for the underworld bosses until you become one yourself, Russian mafia have taken over the city now you have to fight to survive and take over the crime city for yourself, complete story line with endless fun and excitement.

Features of Real Gangster Vegas Crime City:
Exciting gangster story line setting in Vegas city
Multiple challenging tasks and missions
Different crime and mafia levels
Multiple gangster character selection
